title: league of legend is taking 17+GB  data
body: I am new in league of legend, and currently downloading the, i found its taking 17+GB data So, i checked in google i found other player only used 8 to 12 GB to download game, so i wantr to ask is this new update which is taking 17+GB and how can i pause it so i can download later, becuse i have limited data perday

replies.body: Unfortunately our client doesn't have a pause feature for patches or the initial download, so you'll need to let it finish up in one setting somehow. The initial install can be a little large, but ultimately it won't take up that much space once it's downloaded and patched up.
